name: Schmup Trainer
description:
A minimal shoot em up, that tries to discourage shooting.

Try and make it through 5 rounds of increasing difficulty and post your score.

Instructions : arrow or WASD keys to move, space to shoot, controller support in browsers that support it, what more could you want?

OK, Maybe M to turn off the music and P to pause.

Originally made for Mini Ludum Dare 72 - Elympics
